title: Saturday Matinee: History of the Second World War
description:
On today’s Saturday Matinee, the impenetrable Maginot Line, 280-mile-long defensive border the French erected to keep Germany out. It didn’t work.

Link to the History of the Second World War podcast: http://historyofthesecondworldwar.com/
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
